mapper.sql: a.pkid AS "pkid", a.prjfinishname AS "prjfinishname", a.prjfinishnum AS "prjfinishnum", a.prjfinishinnernum AS "prjfinishinnernum", a.prjnum AS "prjnum", a.builderlicencenum AS "builderlicencenum", a.qccorpname AS "qccorpname", a.qccorpcode AS "qccorpcode", a.factcost AS "factcost", a.factarea AS "factarea", a.factsize AS "factsize", a.prjstructuretypenum AS "prjstructuretypenum", a.bdate AS "bdate", a.edate AS "edate", a.mark AS "mark", a.createdate AS "createdate", a.updateflag AS "updateflag", a.sbdqbm AS "sbdqbm", a.datastate AS "datastate", a.cjrqsj AS "cjrqsj", a.xgrqsj AS "xgrqsj", a.scrqsj AS "scrqsj", a.returnresult AS "returnresult", a.updateuser AS "updateuser", a.tag AS "tag", c.CodeInfo AS "prjstructuretypenumLabel"
INNER JOIN dbo.TBProjectInfo b ON a.PrjNum = b.PrjNum LEFT JOIN dbo.tbPrjStructureTypeDic c ON a.PrjStructureTypeNum = c.Code
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tbprojectfinishmanage a
b.CountyNum = '320211'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}

SELECT
FROM tbprojectfinishmanage a
b.CountyNum = '320211'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbprojectfinishmanage( pkid, prjfinishname, prjfinishnum, prjfinishinnernum, prjnum, builderlicencenum, qccorpname, qccorpcode, factcost, factarea, factsize, prjstructuretypenum, bdate, edate, mark, createdate, updateflag, sbdqbm, datastate, cjrqsj, xgrqsj, scrqsj, returnresult, updateuser, tag ) VALUES ( #{pkid}, #{prjfinishname}, #{prjfinishnum}, #{prjfinishinnernum}, #{prjnum}, #{builderlicencenum}, #{qccorpname}, #{qccorpcode}, #{factcost}, #{factarea}, #{factsize}, #{prjstructuretypenum}, #{bdate}, #{edate}, #{mark}, #{createdate}, #{updateflag}, #{sbdqbm}, #{datastate}, #{cjrqsj}, #{xgrqsj}, #{scrqsj}, #{returnresult}, #{updateuser}, #{tag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbprojectfinishmanage SET pkid = #{pkid}, prjfinishname = #{prjfinishname}, prjfinishnum = #{prjfinishnum}, prjfinishinnernum = #{prjfinishinnernum}, prjnum = #{prjnum}, builderlicencenum = #{builderlicencenum}, qccorpname = #{qccorpname}, qccorpcode = #{qccorpcode}, factcost = #{factcost}, factarea = #{factarea}, factsize = #{factsize}, prjstructuretypenum = #{prjstructuretypenum}, bdate = #{bdate}, edate = #{edate}, mark = #{mark}, createdate = #{createdate}, updateflag = #{updateflag}, sbdqbm = #{sbdqbm}, datastate = #{datastate}, cjrqsj = #{cjrqsj}, xgrqsj = #{xgrqsj}, scrqsj = #{scrqsj}, returnresult = #{returnresult}, updateuser = #{updateuser}, tag = #{tag} WHERE id = #{id}
